talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Because of the size of the vibration, there's a wide range of areas to look at. While we're checking the nightmare, why don't you examine the Silver Dragon's Forcefield?

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Of course, our Dragon must be keeping an eye on the place, but we need to determine the cause. If there's something as strange as before, we might need your power.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!
<html>$Unexpected Encounter$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Trouble? What are you talking about... Actually, this place has changed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
(Velskud looks incredibly angry.)
Tell me! What trouble did you make this time?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That giant tree, that silver road... Everything has changed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You came here without even knowing what happened?
(He seems to clench his teeth as if biting his tongue.)
It was a huge vibration that shook the whole barrier, and you didn't feel it? At least you recognize that the place has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Rearranged… Is that what happened in <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah, exactly. Space has been totally rearranged.

$Velskud$
Of course there have been changes there too. Isn't that why you came to see me?

${user_nick}$
(You tell Velskud what Priestess of Darkness Shea said and about the changes in Saint Haven.)
His Majesty and I are the only ones who recognize the situation.

$Velskud$
I'm not surprised. That's how humans are. The things that surround them have changed completely, yet they don't even see it. They carry on as calmly as fish in a fishbowl.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Right, but why <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT> of all places….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Think of the underlying principles of this world, fool. Lagendia can change at any time according to the Goddess's dreams. This time the change was so enormous that the entirety of space is shaking in the aftereffects. It's because the whole dream has moved.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course I know. There's a palace.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
… You still don't know what's inSaint Haven?

$Velskud$
(Glares at you coldly)

$Velskud$
Yes. TheGarden of Time and Space is a place for collecting and monitoring the Goddess's nightmares. Of course, the place is greatly influenced by dreams.

$Velskud$
I'm sure you remember what the collapse was about.

${user_nick}$
Because Labynia haphazardly fashioned and separated the fabric of space... The Goddess's nightmares are being created randomly?

$Velskud$
You've finally found a use for that tiny head of yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way, that's why this place has changed, too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
The Garden of Time and Space, the Labyrinth, the Storm of Time and Space… Think about it. You consider this place to be safe, but Saint Haven is on the front line of the nightmare.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's nothing wrong with the barrier though, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah. It's the same problem. Even if the barrier blocks the nightmare's energy from flowing into the open Monolith, the change in dreams is bound to appear most intensely here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, not at all! But with that amount of vibration... The Goddess is not going to wake up, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
… How dare you doubt my ability? You've become quite brave.

$Velskud$
Why, are you worried?

${user_nick}$
How can I not be worried after hearing what Feder said? I have no choice but to look for the Cup of Healing, but I don't know what the consequences will be in our world. Besides...
(Your mind races with thoughts.)

$Velskud$
Stop making a fuss. I'm having enough trouble thinking about Labynia... Wait, what is that?

${user_nick}$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
… Huh? What? What is this?

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… Did you say this place is dangerous?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair${action:Talk}
What brings you to this dangerous place…? {user_nick}, you must not remain here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why are you here if this place is so dangerous?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
This place is a dream within a dream. It is a shadow of the past, a world away from reality. Here even priestesses possessing the power of darkness lose themselves.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
That is why I must come. It is my destiny to look into the deepest abyss of darkness. However, I had hoped you would never come here, {user_nick}.

${user_nick}$
Saint Haven suddenly changed. So did the Silver Dragon's Forcefield... Then I somehow got swept away and found myself here. What the heck is happening to this world, to the Goddess's dream?

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Velskud said that too. That it changed our reality…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
A great tremor spread across the darkness because the Goddess's dream changed.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Yes, that's how reality has changed, and now the dreams within the dream are moving. A significant event has begun.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Return to reality… How do I get back?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
I don't know where the Goddess will lead you. However, {user_nick}, you must return to reality somehow.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(You reach out your hand to Eclair.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Trust in the path the Goddess has laid out for you. And…
(Eclair looks in your direction and says something, but an unknown whirlwind starts to develop and you can't hear her voice.)

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
The thing inside you…… Destiny… Great…
(Eclair reaches out to you, but the surrounding landscape changes before you can grab it.)

※You cannot proceed with this quest while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Warrior Xian${action:Talk}
{user_class} {user_nick}! You are here, too.

$Warrior Xian${sound:npc_war_q3844_01.ogg}
It's like Saint Haven from back in the day! Did we travel back in time again?

${user_nick}$
(Considering what I was just told… This must be a dream within a dream.)
No, this place is… somewhat different. We didn't time travel... we entered a fragment of the Goddess's dream.

$Warrior Xian${sound:npc_war_q3844_08.ogg}
So this is part of the Goddess's dream too? This is exactly what Feder was afraid of… Does this mean the place is about to disappear after suddenly changing?!

${user_nick}$
There's no need to be so worried. Would the Goddess really abandon us like that?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm glad to hear that, but how did you get here in the first place, Xian?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian$
Well, when you put it that way,{user_nick}... I feel more at ease, at least.

$Warrior Xian$
I was investigating the changes occurring in Saint Haven. Oh… {user_nick}, did you see it too? How Saint Haven had…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(So the king asked him to investigate too...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian$
What a relief! I thought His Majesty and I were the only ones.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Right, I can see why he might have thought that way.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian${sound:npc_war_q3844_07.ogg}
This must have been what His Majesty Cassius was worried about. It was a shock to think Saint Haven had undergone even more drastic changes!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(After the conversation, Xian resumes looking around. You should go to Triana.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian${sound:npc_war_q3844_09.ogg}
I'm glad we recognized that the city has changed, if nothing else. But now the first priority is getting out of this place. We mustn't be trapped here!

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Warrior Xian$
I'm glad we recognized that the city has changed, if nothing else. But now the first priority is getting out of this place. We mustn't be trapped here!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Right. I never thought I'd see Xian and Angelica here either….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana{action:Talk}
{user_nick}. This is a bit of an awkward situation to say 'Hello, nice to see you.'

$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_08.ogg}
The future is beyond prophecy, but the past... Why has the past returned? I don't understand.

${user_nick}$
(Everyone thinks this is the past…)
This place is a dream within a dream… A collection of fragments that have fallen from the Goddess's dream.

$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_07.ogg}
Has something happened to the Goddess? What is the meaning of this...?
This reminds me of what Shea said. She mentioned there was a huge tremor. Velskud said the same thing.

${user_nick}$
Vibrations felt in the Goddess's dream… That must contain the answer.

$Archer Triana$
I think so too. You called this place a collection of fragments that fell from the dream earlier. Maybe... Did the vibrations reach these fragments too?

${user_nick}$
(Yeah, that's exactly what Eclair said.)
We can't jump to conclusions, but maybe. I'll have to look into the details...

$Archer Triana$
To do that, we have to figure out a way to escape here first.

$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_09.ogg}
Compared to the great flow of power felt in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield... The energy here is still. This means we have been isolated from space. I haven't the foggiest notion what to do.

${user_nick}$
I know it won't happen, but I still wish a prophet could show us the way. Or just about anyone, really...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You are right, Triana. We must find a way out on our own.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana${action:Talk}
If it were our Telesia to follow someone's lead, we would. But... that world is gone.

$Archer Triana$
Having spoken with them earlier, it seems Xian and Angelica also noticed the changes.

$Archer Triana$
Yes. This is something we must consider. Why were we the ones brought here?

${user_nick}$
(Indeed, of all people, we're the only ones here. I heard that being in a dream within a dream was dangerous, but... Somehow, I feel safer here, and I think there's a reason.)

${user_nick}$
(This time it's different from Mobius. I feel like I'm where I should be, where I should have come. And I even feel warm and cozy.)

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Archer Triana$
(Triana seems lost in thought. Go speak with Angelica.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Angelica? That's right. We all ended up here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Angelica${sound:npc_soc_q3850_08.ogg}
I wish we could break that wall and, "tada!", go back... But it doesn't work that way, right?
Oh! {user_class} {user_nick} ! You were dragged here, too?

$Sorceress Angelica${action:Talk}
Well, by any chance were you at the Silver Dragon's Forcefield too? Is this where you ended from there?

${user_nick}$
(No need to bring up meeting Eclair.)
Yes, we have been swept up in a dream within a dream.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ah... Well... Basically, our entire world is the Goddess's dream...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Angelica$
What? A dream within a dream?! So this is part of the Goddess's dream in the end, too?

$Sorceress Angelica${sound:npc_soc_q3850_07.ogg}
Whatever! This is still part of the Goddess's dream! Doesn't this remind you of something? {user_class}, as a servant of the Goddess, perhaps you might have some kind of revelation to share with us? What? You have nothing?

$Sorceress Angelica$
The Goddess has to answer eventually.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Angelica's eyes are on fire. She's really scary when she gets like this.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Angelica$
Oh, clerics are so slow to the punch. I've actually been thinking that maybe all this was planned by Vestinel. But...!

$Sorceress Angelica${sound:npc_soc_q3850_09.ogg}
There's no way Vestinel could interfere here so easily, right? A Goddess's dream within a dream, you said! In a way, this might be the deepest place, a place where even Vestinel can't touch. I think we were summoned here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(She's surprisingly sharp when it comes to certain topics.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Angelica${sound:npc_soc_q3850_06.ogg}
There must be a reason why we're here. There is some meaning behind all of this. Us gathering like this cannot be mere happenstance!

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Sorceress Angelica$
There must be a reason why we're here. There is some meaning behind all of this. Us gathering like this cannot be mere happenstance!

$Velskud$
You troublemaker! What are you doing here!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(If would could go back, we would have already...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Quiet! You're lucky your very existence hasn't been eradicated, coming all the way here. You fools, go back to where you came from!

$Velskud$
(Velskud glares in your direction with terrifying eyes. It would be beneficial for your health not to say anything right now.)
Do you know where you are right now? You're in a dream within a dream. I couldn't hold onto you before, so you were swept all the way here!

$Velskud$
I thought you were an okay kid, but I guess I was mistaken. It must have been hard for that woman to clean up your messes all the time...
(His mouth snaps shut and he seems to be holding back his anger.)
Quickly, grab my hand.

$Velskud$
Unless you want to spend a thousand years here, grab my hand. You'll have to keep your wits about you to avoid being swept away.

$Velskud$
You must want to stay here for a thousand years. I won't stop you.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(So this place… is the Silver Dragon's... Forcefield)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.
It's true that a huge transformation has occurred, but you don't know why, or how it has affected the rest of the world. Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and find out what's going on.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Speak with Priestess of Darkness Eclair.
After falling into the cracks created by the distortions in Time and Space, you see her right in front of you. Talk to Priestess of Darkness Eclair.

Eye of the Goddess-Priestess of Darkness Eclair

※To get to Eclair, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Warrior Xian.
You were swept up by another whirlwind. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Warrior Xian

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Archer Triana.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Priestess of Darkness Eclair. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Archer Triana

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Speak with Sorceress Angelica.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Priestess of Darkness Eclair. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Sorceress Angelica

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
As you were speaking with the others and beginning to fall into the abyss of despair, Velskud appeared before you. Is he, like Priestess of Darkness Eclair, part of the Goddess's dream within a dream that appeared for but an instance? Speak with him and find out.

Old Saint Haven-Velskud

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅶ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
You escaped the Old Saint Haven, the dream within a dream. Velskud is looking your way silently. Talk to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
